!3 INTEGER, SMALLINT, DECIMAL

!| Query | !-
select 1e5 integer_type, 1 small_integer_type, 3.5 dec_type
union all
select -1e5, -1, -3.5 
-! |
| integer_type | small_integer_type |dec_type|
| 100000 | 1 |3.5|
| -100000 | -1 |-3.5|

to_timestamp('2020-01-01 12:00:00', 'YYYY-DD-MM HH:MI:SS') ts 
-!|
|dt|ts|
|2020-01-01|2020-01-01 12:00:00.0|
